title: Symmetric & Cyclic Sums; Schur and Muirhead
content:
Overview

Learn notations \sum_{sym} and \sum_{cyc}. Schur's inequality unlocks many symmetric inequalities; Muirhead orders symmetric sums.

Schur (r=1)

\sum a^3+3abc \ge \sum_{sym} a^2b for a,b,c\ge 0. Often combined with AM-GM and rearrangement.

Solution Sketch

Apply Cauchy in Engel form and Schur to bound cross terms after homogenization.
